formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.2:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'SetCIDName' =-
[Synopsis] Set CallerID Name
[Description] SetCIDName(cname[|a]): Set Caller*ID Name on a call to a new value, while preserving the original Caller*ID number. This is useful for providing additional information to the called party. SetCIDName has been deprecated in favor of the function CALLERID(name)

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
